alert.note: Alert for Knox; Marshall; Peoria; Stark (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 7:11PM CDT until May 07 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Marshall County in central Illinois... Stark County in north central Illinois... Knox County in west central Illinois... Northwestern Peoria County in central Illinois... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 710 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Annawan to near Seaton, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Osceola, Elmira, Bradford, Castleton, Wyoming and Camp Grove. This includes Interstate 74 between mile markers 34 and 64. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
